mapper.select: SELECT e.*, s.title FROM emoji e JOIN store s ON e.emoji = s.emoji WHERE e.user_ref = #{param1}
mapper.update: UPDATE emoji SET use_emoji='F' WHERE user_ref=#{param1} and use_emoji='T'
UPDATE emoji SET use_emoji='T' WHERE emoji_idx=#{emoji_idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO emoji (emoji_idx, user_ref, emoji) VALUES (seq_emoji_idx.nextval, #{user_ref}, #{emoji})
